pull.title: Remove GUI 'generate coins' option.
pull.body: Hide this capability from GUI users, who are unlikely to understand upon first contact that they will waste electricity for year(s), before possibly generating a single block.

events.message:
Remove GUI's "Generate Coins" option from the menu.

CPU mining remains available via command line option [until/unless
the community decides to remove that completely].

events.body: Updated branch to ignore fGenerateBitcoins stored wallet setting (see forum thread) in GUI version of bitcoin.
